				<p>Yesterday on the Unreal Tournament live Twitch stream, Unreal Tournament art team members Chris Perna, Josh Marlow and Rick Kohler... <a class="more_link" href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/the-evolution-of-outpost-23/">Read more &raquo;</a></p>			</div>

		<section id="main-content" role="main">

					
			<h2 class="section-header">Latest news</h2>
			
						
								
					    
			<article id="post-2015" class="post-2015 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-unreal-tournament tag-build tag-custom-level tag-dev tag-epic-games-2 tag-flak tag-game-dev tag-levels tag-maps tag-pete-knepley tag-petenub tag-release tag-rzelive tag-sidney-rauchberger tag-stacey-conley tag-ut tag-ut-modding tag-zack-estep list-small-thumb">

					
					<div class="img-wrapper">
						<a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/community-map-review-build-update-and-more/" rel="bookmark" title="Community Map Review, Build Update and More!" class="img-bevel video">
							<img width="200" height="200" src="//www.unrealtournament.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/image1-200x200.jpg" class="attachment-article-thumb wp-post-image" alt="image1" />						</a>
					</div>
				
				<div class="entry-date">
					<span class="day">26</span><span class="month">Mar</span>
				</div>
				
				<div class="entry-header">
					<h2><a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/community-map-review-build-update-and-more/" title="Community Map Review, Build Update and More!">Community Map Review, Build Update and More!</a></h2>
					<div class="entry-meta">						
							Posted in  <a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/category/unreal-tournament/" rel="category tag">Unreal Tournament</a> | 							
							<a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/community-map-review-build-update-and-more/#respond" title="Comment on Community Map Review, Build Update and More!"><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="2015 http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/?p=2015">Leave a comment</span></a>                                                					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="entry-content">
						<p>This week, we had our first stream on our new set! First up we have recap of GDC and show... <br /><a  class="more" href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/community-map-review-build-update-and-more/">Read more &raquo;</a></p>	
				</div>

							</article>

					</div>
				
				<div class="entry-date">
					<span class="day">23</span><span class="month">Mar</span>

				<div class="entry-header">
					<h2><a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/gdc-2015-tim-fangon/" title="GDC 2015 &#8211; Tim Fangon">GDC 2015 &#8211; Tim Fangon</a></h2>
					<div class="entry-meta">						
							Posted in  <a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/category/unreal-tournament/" rel="category tag">Unreal Tournament</a> | 							
							<a href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/gdc-2015-tim-fangon/#respond" title="Comment on GDC 2015 &#8211; Tim Fangon"><span class="dsq-postid" data-dsqidentifier="1996 http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/?p=1996">Leave a comment</span></a>                                                					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="entry-content">
						<p>by Tim Fangon Hey guys, Tim here. I’d like to share a little bit of the experiences I had at... <br /><a  class="more" href="http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/gdc-2015-tim-fangon/">Read more &raquo;</a></p>	
				</div>

				<div class="widget"><h3 class="widget-title">Join us for our Weekly Stream! </h3>			<div class="textwidget"><p>Join us each Wednesday at 2:00 PM EST for our live stream on  <a href=http://www.twitch.tv/unrealtournament/ data-popup="true">our Twitch channel</a> for all of the details! Be sure to subscribe to be notified when streams are starting!</p>

                    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                    
                    var shortly;
                    shortly = new Date();		
                    shortly.setSeconds("210468");	 
                    jQuery('#countdown').countdown({until: shortly,layout: '<div class="days"><div id=\"day\">{d<}{dnn}{d>} </div><span id=\"days-span\">DAYS</span></div>  <div class="hours"><div id=\"hours\">{h<}{hnn}{h>} </div><span id=\"hours-span\">HRS</span></div>' + '<div class="minutes"><div id=\"minutes\">{m<}{mnn}{m>}</div><span id=\"minutes-span\">MIN</span></div>',format:'DHM',onExpiry: liftOff()});
                         
                    function liftOff() { 
                        jQuery('#counter').hide();
                        jQuery('#counterlive').show();
                    } 
                    });
                    </script>
            									<div id="counter" class=""  >
							<h3>Join us on our Live Stream!</h3>
							<div id="countdown"></div>
							<div id="date">Wednesday, April 01 2015 02:00:00 PM EDT</div>
							</div>

<script type="text/rocketscript">
/* <![CDATA[ */
	var dropdown = document.getElementById("cat");
	function onCatChange() {
		if ( dropdown.options[dropdown.selectedIndex].value > 0 ) {
			location.href = "http://www.unrealtournament.com/blog/?cat="+dropdown.options[dropdown.selectedIndex].value;
		}
	}
	dropdown.onchange = onCatChange;
/* ]]> */
</script>

        <script type="text/rocketscript">
        // <![CDATA[
        var disqus_shortname = 'unrealtournamentblog';
        (function () {
            var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
            for (var i = 0, url; i < nodes.length; i++) {
                if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
                    nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('data-dsqidentifier'));
                    url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
                    if (url.length == 1) { url = url[0]; }
                    else { url = url[1]; }
                    nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
                }
            }
            var s = document.createElement('script'); 
            s.async = true;
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/count.js';
            (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
        }());
        // ]]>
        </script>
        	<div style="display:none">
	</div>
		<script type="text/rocketscript">
			!function(d,s,id){
				var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],p=/^http:/.test(d.location)?'http':'https';
				if(!d.getElementById(id)){
					js=d.createElement(s);
					js.id=id;js.src=p+"://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";
					fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);
				}
			}(document,"script","twitter-wjs");
		</script>
